name: scripts/actions.js
attack
description: This function is used for attacking a target

name: seekTarget
description: Loops through all enemy teams and looks for targets

name: createMoveArea
description: Creates a move area around the selected unit

name: delMoveArea
description: Deletes current move area

name: delIndicators
description: Delete indicators

name: createDmgMarker
description: Creates a dmg marker / blood

name: showUnitInfo
description: Shows unit information

name: scripts/ai.js
AI
description: AI closure

name: doAI
description: Main action for AI. This function gets called when the current player is AI

name: executeTurn
description: Executes a series of actions for the current AI unit

name: getClosestMove
description: Pick the movement area that is closest to an enemy unit

name: scripts/board.js
board
description: Board is the main game area that holds all of the tiles

name: tile
description: Tiles

name: scripts/collections.js
scripts/items.js
scripts/main.js
scripts/pieces.js
Entity
description: Entity is a super class for all pieces on the board

name: flip
description: Flips the sprite of the piece

name: Piece
description: Piece is any piece on the board. It is a super class for heris, units and obstacles

name: takeDmg
description: Piece takes damage

name: export
description: Exports the object for saving

name: Unit
description: Unit pieces

name: endturn
description: Handle functions related to turn end

name: checkMoves
description: Check the unit's moves

name: updateMoves
description: Updates the unit's moves after an action

name: move
description: Move unit to tile

name: Soldier
description: Soldiers are the normal army units

name: Hero
description: Heros are different

name: equip
description: Equip the hero with an item

name: unEquip
description: Unequip item

name: Obstacle
description: Obstacles are stuff like trees and stones

name: scripts/stats.js
content:
var human_names = ["George", "Paul", "Joel", "Margaret", "Simo", "Timo", "Hasan", "Alex", "Tommy", "Jarmo"];

function chooseName(namearr){
    return namearr[Math.floor(Math.random()*namearr.length)];
}



/***
*   Heroes
*
***/
function HeroStats(cls, sex){

    var _this = this

    this.stats = {
        "list": ["war","wiz","pal"],
        "war": {
            "female": {},
            "male": {
                "meta": {
                    "disabled": false,
                    "type": "Hero",          
                    "sheet-cls": "hero_main_war_male",
                    "sheet-size": 256,
                    "width": 64,
                    "height": 128,
                    "flipped": 1             
                },
                "stats": {
                    "alive": true,
                    "lvl": 0,
                    "lvl_max": 3,
                    "lvl_prog":[{"dmg":11},{"hp_max":53},{"dex":7}],
                    "exp": 0,
                    "exp_max": [100,200,300],
                    "name": "unit name",
                    "moves": 2,
                    "moves_max": 2,
                    "hp": 50,
                    "hp_max": 50,
                    "mp": 0,
                    "mp_max": 0,
                    "def": 0,
                    "dmg": 10,
                    "dex": 5,
                    "agi": 2,
                    "int": 10,
                    "range": 1.5,
                    "height": 1 
                }
            }       
        }
    }

    this.getStats = function(cls, sex){
        return _this.stats[cls][sex]
    }
    
}

/***
*   Obstacles
*
***/

function getObsStats(type, subtype){
    console.log('type:'+type+' subtype:'+subtype )
    console.log(obsStats[type][subtype])
    return obsStats[type][subtype]
}

scripts/utility.js
randomBetween
description: Get a random number between values

name: getDistance
description: Get distance between two points

name: getAngle
description: Get angle between two points

name: lineofsight
description:
Check line between two points and check
if tiles along that line are occupied.

name: bresenhamLine
description: Uses the Brasenham line algorithm to check a staggered path along a grid

name: translate
description: Tweens between two points
